statements: SELECT * FROM patents WHERE approval_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT patent_title, patent_inventor FROM patents WHERE filing_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT patent_id, patent_title, filing_date FROM patents ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT patent_description FROM patents WHERE grant_date > '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM patents WHERE patent_inventor = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM patents WHERE filing_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT patent_title, patent_inventor FROM patents WHERE approval_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY grant_date DESC;
SELECT patent_title, COUNT(*) AS total FROM patents GROUP BY patent_title HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT patent_inventor, MAX(approval_date) AS latest_approval FROM patents GROUP BY patent_inventor;
SELECT * FROM patents WHERE filing_date < '2019-01-01' OR filing_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patents;
SELECT patent_name, filing_date, expiration_date FROM patents WHERE patent_owner = 'ExampleOwner';
SELECT patent_name, patent_description FROM patents WHERE filing_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patents ORDER BY expiration_date DESC, filing_date ASC;
SELECT owner_name, owner_email, owner_address FROM owners;
SELECT patent_id, patent_name, filing_date FROM patents;
SELECT patent_description, patent_owner FROM patents WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patents WHERE filing_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT patent_name, owner_name, owner_email FROM patents JOIN owners ON patents.patent_owner = owners.owner_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patents, owner_name FROM patents JOIN owners ON patents.patent_owner = owners.owner_id GROUP BY owner_name;
SELECT * FROM Patent;
SELECT patent_title, inventor FROM Patent ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT holder_name, country FROM PatentHolder WHERE country='USA';
SELECT * FROM Patent WHERE filing_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT country FROM PatentHolder ORDER BY country ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patent ORDER BY filing_date DESC, patent_title ASC;
SELECT inventor, filing_date FROM Patent WHERE filing_date > '2022-01-01' AND filing_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT p.patent_title, ph.holder_name, ph.country FROM Patent p JOIN PatentHolder ph ON p.patent_id = ph.patent_id WHERE ph.country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM AccessControl WHERE role = 'admin';

SELECT p.patent_title, ph.holder_name, ac.username FROM Patent p JOIN PatentHolder ph ON p.patent_id = ph.patent_id JOIN AccessControl ac ON ph.holder_id = ac.user_id ORDER BY p.patent_title ASC, ac.username DESC;
SELECT * FROM patents;
SELECT patent_id, patent_title, inventor_name FROM patents WHERE filing_country = 'US';
SELECT patent_title, filing_date FROM patents ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patent_authors WHERE author_affiliation LIKE '%University%';
SELECT * FROM patent_reviews WHERE review_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patent_title, inventor_name, filing_date FROM patents;
SELECT * FROM patent_authors WHERE author_affiliation = 'University of Science';
SELECT patent_id, patent_title, filing_date FROM patents ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patent_reviews WHERE review_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patent_id, inventor_name, filing_country FROM patents WHERE filing_country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM patent_information;
SELECT id, patent_number, applicant_name FROM patent_information ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT description FROM patent_information WHERE id = 1;
SELECT owner_name, owner_address, owner_contact FROM patent_owners WHERE patent_id = 10;
SELECT assignee_name, assignee_type FROM patent_assignees WHERE patent_id = 5 AND assignee_type = 'Company';
SELECT * FROM patent_information;
SELECT patent_number, applicant_name FROM patent_information WHERE filing_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT description FROM patent_information WHERE id = 3;
SELECT owner_name, owner_address FROM patent_owners WHERE owner_contact LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT assignee_name, assignee_type, assignee_contact FROM patent_assignees WHERE patent_id = 5;
